DOC.brief_summary: The investigator conduct educational intervention pregnant woman plan breastfeed promote exclusive breastfeeding increase duration breastfeeding .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Controlled Trial Antenatal Intervention Increase Exclusive Breastfeeding
DOC.detailed_description: The intervention include 20 30-minute one-to-one educational talk lactation expert explain fact breastfeed answer participant question . The educational intervention focus : ( 1 ) importance exclusive breastfeeding , ( 2 ) milk supply/demand feed demand , ( 3 ) frequency feeding , feed cue , know infant get enough milk , ( 4 ) avoid artificial nipple infant nurse well , ( 5 ) importance good latch , ( 5 ) seek breastfeeding help support , ( 7 ) return work continue breastfeeding .
DOC.criteria: 1. singleton pregnancy , 2. primiparous 3 . 18 year age old , 4. least 36 week gestation , 5 . Cantonese speaking , 6 . Hong Kong resident , 7. serious medical obstetrical complication , 8. stay Hong Kong least 6 month delivery , 9. intention breastfeed . Participants exclude study entitle health benefit Hong Kong ( NEP ) .
